article.title: Air Force Taps Kendall for Warfighting Integration Post
article.author: Beverly Schaeffer

tags.tag: Office of the Secretary of the Air Force
Office of Warfighting Integration and CIO

article.text: Brig. Gen. Jeffrey B. Kendall, USAF, has been nominated for appointment to director, warfighter systems integration, Office of Warfighting Integration and Chief Information Officer, Office of the Secretary of the Air Force, Pentagon, Washington, D.C. Â
